entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming sunny this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
